CustomField.formula:
DATE( YEAR(Startdate_contract__c) + FLOOR((Netsuite_Term__c + MONTH(Startdate_contract__c)) / 12) - IF (MOD(MONTH(Startdate_contract__c) + Netsuite_Term__c, 12) = 0, 1, 0),
MOD((Netsuite_Term__c + MONTH(Startdate_contract__c) - 1), 12) + 1,
DAY(Startdate_contract__c) )
CustomField.label: Contract Renewal Date
